<h1 align="center">SteamDB AppID Copier</h1>
<div align="center">

English | [–†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π](./README.ru.md)

A Firefox extension that adds convenient copy buttons for Steam App IDs on SteamDB pages.

![Release Download](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/megatocha/steamDB-AppID-Copier/total?style=for-the-badge&labelColor=fae5c0&color=%234caf50&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)
[![GitHub License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/megatocha/steamDB-AppID-Copier?style=for-the-badge&labelColor=fae5c0&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](LICENSE)
[![GitHub Star](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/megatocha/steamDB-AppID-Copier?style=for-the-badge&labelColor=fae5c0&color=yellow&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://github.com/megatocha/steamDB-AppID-Copier/stargazers)
![GitHub Repo size](https://img.shields.io/github/repo-size/megatocha/steamDB-AppID-Copier?style=for-the-badge&color=3cb371&labelColor=fae5c0&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)
[![Release Version](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/megatocha/steamDB-AppID-Copier?style=for-the-badge&labelColor=fae5c0&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://github.com/megatocha/steamDB-AppID-Copier/releases/latest)

</div>

## ‚ú® Features
- üéÆ **Individual Game Pages**: Copy button next to the information fields
- üìä **Charts and Sales Pages**: Copy buttons for each game in the table
- üìú **Popup and History**: Easy to re-copy
- üé® **Modern Design**: Beautiful gradient buttons with smooth animations
- ‚ö° **Fast**: Lightweight and efficient

### üöÄ Fast Installation
[![Firefox Download](https://img.shields.io/badge/Firefox-Download-%23FF7139?logo=firefoxbrowser&labelColor=%23222222&color=%234caf50&style=for-the-badge)][firefox]
[![Firefox Users](https://img.shields.io/amo/dw/steamdb-app-id-copier?labelColor=23222222&label=&style=for-the-badge)][firefox]

### ‚¨áÔ∏è Manual Installation (Development)
1. Download or clone this repository
2. Open Firefox and navigate to `about:debugging`
3. Click "This Firefox" in the sidebar
4. Click "Load Temporary Add-on"
5. Select the `manifest.json` file from the downloaded folder

## ‚öôÔ∏è Usage
1. Navigate to any SteamDB game page or charts page
2. Look for the purple "Copy" buttons next to App IDs
3. Click to copy the App ID to your clipboard
4. A notification will confirm the copy action

## üìé Supported Pages
- `steamdb.info/app/*` - Individual game pages
- `steamdb.info/charts/` - Game rankings and charts
- `steamdb.info/sales/` - Sales and fests
